column4: at some point today, possibly after updates, i noticed that when i click on the ubuntu applications menu it highlights but no drop down panel appears, although places and system work fine. i have read that if i 'rm ~/.config/menus/applications.menu' may fix it, is this the correct action and would i then lose all entires for wine etc?
that'll move it to your user directory and if it don't work, move it back... but if the system can't find your applcaitons.menu file it creates a default one
